Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Ofatumumab is approved to be used alone or with other drugs to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL).It is used alone as extended treatment in patients with recurrent or progressive disease who are in complete or partial response after at least two other types of treatment.It is used with fludarabine phosphate and cyclophosphamide in patients with relapsed disease.It is used alone in patients who have not gotten better with other drugs.It is used with chlorambucil in patients who have never been treated and cannot receive certain chemotherapy.

Section.Para: Ofatumumab is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
